Undead

{:rpd:images:undead_sprite.png?200|} The Undead are powerful undead enemies that spawn during the King boss fight in Remixed Dungeon.

Stats

  • Level: Appears during King boss fight (level 21-22)
  • HP: High
  • Attack: High
  • Defense: High
  • EXP: Significant

Description

During the battle with the King, additional Undead are summoned to aid the King. These are former Dwarven heroes that have been corrupted by the King's dark magic.

Behavior

  • Aggressive toward the player
  • Assist the King during the boss fight
  • Appear multiple times during the battle

Drops

The Undead typically drop:

  • Gold
  • Random equipment or items
  • May drop unique items during the King fight

Special Notes

  • Spawned specifically during the King boss fight
  • Multiple Undead can appear at once
  • Part of the King's defensive forces
  • Defeating all Undead is necessary to reach the King directly
rpd, mobs, undead, boss king

Undead Mobs

Undead mobs are creatures that have been reanimated after death, often through necromancy or other dark magic. They are typically immune to some status effects that affect living creatures and may have other special properties.

Description

Undead Mobs are a category of monsters in Remixed Dungeon that have been reanimated after death through various magical means.

List of Undead Mobs

  • Skeleton
  • Wraith
  • Zombie
  • Lich - Powerful undead spellcaster
  • Death Knight - Strong melee undead warrior
  • Dread Knight - Another powerful undead warrior
  • Enslaved Soul - Bound spirit
  • Deathling - Summoned undead minion
  • Exploding Skull - Explosive undead creature
  • Treacherous Spirit - Dark spirit creature
  • Spirit of Pain - Pain-inflicting spirit

Common Undead Mobs

  • Lich
  • Enslaved Soul
  • Death Knight
  • Dread Knight
  • Deathling

Properties of Undead

  • Status Immunities: Undead are typically immune to poison, bleeding, and other effects that target living tissue
  • Necromancy Interactions: In games with necromancer class, some undead may be influenced by necromancy spells
  • Healing Effects: Some healing abilities may harm undead instead of healing them
  • Special Resistances: Undead may have resistance to certain damage types
  • Generally immune to fear and terror effects
  • Often resistant or immune to certain status effects like paralysis or sleep
  • May be affected differently by healing/dealing damage mechanics
  • Some undead can be turned or repelled by certain items or abilities

Tactics Against Undead

  • Use weapons and abilities that don't rely on affecting living tissue
  • Holy or blessed weapons/potions may be more effective
  • Fire-based attacks often prove effective against undead
  • Be aware that some healing effects may strengthen undead

Notes

Different classes may have special abilities or bonuses when fighting undead creatures. Understanding their common weaknesses can be advantageous when navigating areas with many undead enemies.
